title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, green & Olive warp.  Med green, teal & metallic blue/green weft. Plain weave variation.  Stapled to 8.5x11\" card along with 99.1.1213.15.  \"H-8B\" written on card. (blue, green, metallic)
